meanings: (영화·소설 등을 만들기 위한) material, subject matter
find out with whom the responsibility lies

vlive.korean: 이거 니트인가? 니트 소재인가? Is this a knit? Is this a knit material? 듣기 View video (G)I-DLE : 수수
